articles.author: David Hookstead
articles.title: Desmond Howard Roasts Ohio State Right To C.J. Stroud’s Face During The Heisman Ceremony - Daily Caller
articles.description: Desmond Howard took a direct shot at Ohio State during the Heisman ceremony Saturday night. He mocked OSU's line to C.J. Stroud's face.
articles.content:
Desmond Howard took a direct shot at Ohio State during the Heisman ceremony Saturday night.
Howard, who won the Heisman playing for Michigan, ripped Ohio State’s offensive line right to quarterback … [+1104 chars]
